Package elki.evaluation.scores

Interface ScoreEvaluation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AUPRCEvaluation, AveragePrecisionEvaluation, DCGEvaluation, MaximumF1Evaluation, NDCGEvaluation, PrecisionAtKEvaluation, PRGCEvaluation, ROCEvaluation
    public interface ScoreEvaluation
    Compute ranking/scoring based evaluation measures.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  ScoreEvaluation.Adapter
      Predicate to test whether an object is a true positive or false positive.
